author: dain
msg: Refactored deployment to the complexity of the conversational interface between the ear builder and the module builders
Decoupled the main deployer from XmlBeans
Ear module builders are almost decoupled from XmlBeans, although all module builders use xml beans internally in the future they will not be forced to

author: akarasulu
msg: fixed some compiler issues due to commons lang deps

author: akarasulu
msg: Moving some classes that were in schema over to commons.  These classes and
interfaces can be used in clients as well as on servers.
